sentences.english: and all these nonprofits, they have clothes that will go on the runway for an audience to see,
sentences.chinese: 这些非营利性组织，他们在T台上展示服装给观众看。

sentences.english: He hastily snatched up a nightdress, leapt onto the catwalk and handed it to the model.
sentences.chinese: 他匆匆抓起一件睡衣，跳上T台，把它递给模特儿。

sentences.english: Now, they have resurfaced on the catwalk and the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 现在，它们又重新出现在T台以及大马路上。

sentences.english: So like I mentioned above, this colour has been all over the runways.
sentences.chinese: 就像我上面所说的那样，驼色已经横扫了所有T台。

sentences.english: I remember the thrill of standing on that tee.
sentences.chinese: 我记得站在那个T台时的激动劲。

sentences.english: Claudia Schiffer appears in her first runway show, modelling Chanel.
sentences.chinese: 克劳迪娅希弗在香奈儿的T台上完成了第一次走秀。

sentences.english: Runways, red carpets, and glossy magazine spreads have all been inundated with the look.
sentences.chinese: T台，红毯，浮夸的杂志上都被这样的打扮淹没了。
